newsitem.title: USA: Gray Communications stake raised by Gabelli.
newsitem.headline: Gray Communications stake raised by Gabelli.

text.p: A group led by New York investment manager Mario Gabelli said Friday it raised its stake in Gray Communications Systems Inc to 524,700 or 14.99 percent from 13.90 percent previously held.

In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said its latest transactions include the purchase of 38,100 additional common shares bought between December 9 and December 10 at prices ranging from $16 to $16.25 per share.
Gray Communications operates two NBC affiliated television stations.
